welcome.description: Your gateway to secure, compliant asset tokenization on the blockchain.
welcome.setup-description-returning: We first need to finish the setup process. This ensures your assets are secure, your on-chain identity is established, and you're ready to experience the future of finance.
welcome.setup-description-new: We'll guide you through a quick setup process. This ensures your assets are secure, your on-chain identity is established, and you're ready to experience the future of finance.

wallet.subtitle: Your Digital Key to the Blockchain
wallet.intro: Think of your wallet as your master key that unlocks all your digital assets and identity on the blockchain. It's a secure set of cryptographic codes that proves you own your tokens and allows you to authorize transactions.
wallet.asset-control-description: View, manage, and interact with tokenized assets on the Asset Tokenization Kit platform. Your wallet gives you complete control over your digital assets.
wallet.invest-in-digital-assets-description: Explore and invest in a wide range of digital assets, including stocks, bonds, and more.
wallet.manage-your-digital-assets-description: Easily manage your digital assets, including buying, selling, and transferring them.
wallet.failed-to-create-wallet: Failed to create wallet. Please try again.
wallet.success-message: Congratulations! Your Web3 wallet has been successfully created
wallet.wallet-address-description: Your wallet address is your unique identifier on the blockchain. It's used to send and receive digital assets, and to interact with smart contracts.

method-selector.title: Secure your Wallet
method-selector.description:
Just like your bank card requires a PIN to confirm payments, your wallet also needs protection to authorize actions securely.

To keep it safe, you can secure it with a PIN code or enable one-time passwords (OTP) for added protection.

pin.title: PIN code
pin.description: A simple 6 digit code you enter on your device to quickly unlock your wallet. Easy and fast.

otp.title: One-Time Password (OTP)
otp.description: A time-based code generated by an authenticator app on your phone. Offers stronger security by requiring a unique code each time you log in.

method-selector.choose-one: You can choose one. As OTP is more secure, it is the recommended option.
method-selector.success-description: Your wallet is now secured! You can now continue to the next step.

pincode.title: Set up a PIN code
pincode.description: Create a 6-digit PIN code to secure your wallet transactions

otp.setup-failed: Failed to get OTP setup data
otp.setup-failed-description: Failed to setup OTP authentication. Please try again.
otp.setting-up-description: Please wait while we generate your QR code.
otp.setup-description: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app
otp.enter-code: Enter the 6-digit code from your app

recovery-codes.title: Your secret codes
recovery-codes.description-2: These codes can be used to recover your wallet if you forget your pin or lose access to your authenticator app.
recovery-codes.warning: Important: Keep these codes safe! They're your only way to regain access if you lose other security methods.
